Package com.hotels.beans.transformer

Class ImmutableObjectTransformationTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hotels.beans.transformer.AbstractTransformerTest
      • com.hotels.beans.transformer.ImmutableObjectTransformationTest
  • public class ImmutableObjectTransformationTest
extends AbstractTransformerTest
    Unit test for all Transformer functions related to Immutable Java Beans.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ImmutableObjectTransformationTest()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void beforeMethod()
      Initialized mocks.
      void testFieldTransformationSkipWorksProperly()
      Test that, given a set of fields for which the transformation has to be skipped, they are actually skipped.
      void testGetConstructorValuesFromFieldsWorksProperly()
      Test that the method: getConstructorValuesFromFields works properly.
      void testGetDestFieldNameIsRetrievedFromConstructorArgIfTheParamNameIsNotProvidedFromJVM()
      Test that method: getDestFieldName retrieves the param name from the ConstructorArg if it is not provided from jvm directly.
      void testGetDestFieldNameReturnsNullIfConstructorParamHasNoNameProvidedFromJVMAndNoConstructorArgIsDefined()
      Test that method: getDestFieldName returns null if the constructor's parameter name is not provided from jvm directly and the ConstructorArg is not defined.
      void testImmutableBeanIsCorrectlyCopied​(java.lang.String testCaseDescription, com.hotels.beans.transformer.Transformer transformer, java.lang.Object sourceObject, java.lang.Class<?> targetObjectClass)
      Test that default transformation of immutable beans works properly.
      void testImmutableBeanWithAdvancedFieldsIsCorrectlyCopied​(java.lang.String testCaseDescription, FromFooAdvFields sourceObject, java.lang.Class<?> targetObjectClass, boolean isNameFieldEmpty)
      Test that bean containing advanced final fields are correctly copied.
      void testImmutableBeanWithDifferentFieldNamesIsCorrectlyCopied()
      Test that bean containing final fields (with different field names) are correctly copied.
      void testImmutableBeanWithMissingConstructorArgIsCorrectlyCopied()
      Test that immutable bean containing a constructor with some field not annotated with ConstructorArg is correctly copied.
      void testThatAnyTypeOfBeanContainsANotExistingFieldInTheSourceObjectIsCorrectlyCopiedThroughTransformerFunctions()
      Test that a bean containing a field not existing in the source object, but with a transformer function defined for such object is correctly copied.
      void testTransformationOnAnExistingDestinationWorksProperly()
      Test transformation on an existing bean is correctly copied.
      void testTransformationReturnsAMeaningfulException()
      Test that a meaningful exception is returned when a constructor is invoked with wrong arguments.
      void testTransformationWithCompositeFieldNameMappingIsWorkingAsExpected​(java.lang.String testCaseDescription, java.lang.Object sourceObject, java.lang.String expectedName, java.math.BigInteger expectedId, int[] expectedPhoneNumbers)
      Test transformation field with composite field name mapping.
      void testTransformThrowsExceptionIfTheConstructorInvocationThrowsException​(java.lang.String testCaseDescription, java.lang.Object sourceObject, java.lang.Class<?> targetObjectClass)
      Test that an exception is thrown if the constructor invocation throws exception.
      void testTransformThrowsExceptionWhenImmutableIsInvalid​(java.lang.String testCaseDescription, FromFoo sourceObject, java.lang.Class<?> targetObjectClass)
      Test that an InvalidBeanException is thrown if the bean is not valid.
      void testTransformThrowsNoExceptionIfTheDestinationObjectValuesAreNotValidAndTheValidationIsDisabled()
      Test that no exception is thrown if the destination object don't met the constraints and the validation is disabled.
